physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features two men posing. They are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. Both of them have their shirts tucked in. The man on the left has his right hand on his hips while the other person puts both his hands behind his back. The background of the photograph displays greenery and trees.
title_text: Two Military Personnel Posing Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
